Hi, I'm Jesse—a UI/UX Designer who enjoys coding and designing for the web.

The work I do

  • UI Design

    I build design systems that result in delightful and intuitive experiences that exceeds users' needs and expectations.

  • UX Design

    I define user flows and deliver meaningful user experiences through prototyping with the goal to fail fast and iterate.

  • Development

    With a focus on performance and accessibility, I build scalable solutions using current and modern web standards.

Although I'm not currently looking for freelance opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether for a potential project or just to say hi, please reach out!
